title: TGH
text: Technology Guest House abbreviated as TGH is one of the guest houses in the campus along with Visveswaraya Guest House and Kolkata Guest House , the latter being situated in Kolkata. It is located on the Scholar's Avenue, next to Director's Bungalow.

title: Infrastructure
text: The guest house has two reception counters, one located in the main building entrance and the other in the annex building located right beside it. Forms for pre-booking are typically available in the reception counter of annex building.

title: Booking
text:
Guests are categorized into 4 categories and are charged accordingly. Category A and Category B guests are usually concerned with institute activities and are invited directly by the institute or any department. Students' parents accommodation is facilitated by Category C and which can be permitted by the hall warden or any other faculty. Finally, Category D is the self reservation option for those who do not fall into above categories.
A status of room availability can be checked online . The booking form can be availed from the counter or download online from the given links below.
